mapper.select: select seq, id, ref, step, depth, title, content, created_at AS createdAt, del, read_count AS readCount from bbs order by seq desc
mapper.insert: insert into bbs(id, ref, setp,depth,title, content,created_at,del,read_count) values (#{id},#{ref},#{step},#{depth},#{title},#{content},#{created_at},now(),#{del},#{readCount})
